meanings.definition: A medicinal substance used to induce vomiting.
meanings.sent1: After ingesting a toxic substance, the doctor administered ipecacuanha to induce vomiting.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended ipecacuanha to help the patient expel the harmful contents from their stomach.
meanings.sent3: The party magician jokingly pretended to use ipecacuanha as a magic potion to make the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The idea of using ipecacuanha to cleanse the body of impurities is like hitting the reset button on your health.
meanings.sent5: The image of ipecacuanha working its magic to rid the body of toxins stayed with her long after the treatment.

meanings.definition: A plant native to Brazil, from which the medicinal substance is derived.
meanings.sent1: The ipecacuanha plant's leaves are carefully harvested to extract the medicinal properties.
meanings.sent2: In Brazil, locals have been using ipecacuanha for generations due to its natural healing abilities.
meanings.sent3: The ipecacuanha plant in the garden seemed to wave hello every time the wind blew, making the gardener smile.
meanings.sent4: The ipecacuanha plant stood tall and proud, a symbol of nature's gift for healing.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the ipecacuanha plant leaves made it easy to spot in the dense forest.
